result.title: Proposing a new Contest
result.content:
We are planning to conduct Fool's Programming contest ( based on concept of April Fool's contest ) as a part of our college tech-fest Felicity, (IIIT-Hyderabad, India). I think since this is not usual contest, proposing it on http://codeforces.com/proposals/new-contest would not help. I tried to contact KAN and MikeMirzayanov through messages on codeforces, for hosting it on codeforces, but didn't received any reply. Can anyone please help or give suggestions on what else can we do?

Thanks in Advance
